text: Naga chili chim’bichilile (chindu) chambone chikasachasakalisyaga, nambo naga chili chimpatile chakusakala akasasengwaga nacho, nambo naga mpilile nikuŵa niwoga (wakun'jogopa Allah), nikuti malindi gao ngaŵa nkuntenda chilichose. Chisimu Allah ichindu yaakutenda ŵanganyao juŵele Jwaisyungula (kwaimanya chenene)
